detail.description:
Partner up with PCash! Rest assured that you are getting the best deals when loaning with us. Our low rates are guaranteed to give you the best Possible PCash experience!

Pave your Path with PCash!




Requirements:
Any functioning smart device
PCash App
One (1) Valid Government-Issued ID




How do I Apply?
Download the PCash App
Complete the registration process
Wait for the verification of your submitted info
Confirm the approved loan details




What do I need to register?
Just upload one (1) valid Government-Issued ID!



What are the privacy and permission policies of PCash?

PCash is strictly compliant with the Data Privacy Law as we respect your privacy rights. The submitted documents upon your registration will be used to verify your credit profile on our system. We will NEVER share any of your data without your direct consent or explicit permission for any purpose.




How safe are my personal details?
Fully secured and protected of all personal details and informations
Data Privacy Agreements are insisted upon registering
Strictly complies to the guidelines set by the NPC
Routine assessments are done to ensure Quality Data Protection



On the app, we will require the following permissions to verify your identity:
Camera Access - To scan your ID for complete ID verification
Location Access - To auto-verify your address
Contacts Access - To easily nominate your contact references.




How fast is the approval and where can I receive the loan?
Approval of loan application can take as fast as 5 minutes to 24 hours

Upon approval, expect same-day disbursement through Skypay
Cash-out centers: RD Pawnshop, M Lhuillier and Palawan Pawnshop
Other withdrawal channels: Bank, GCash, ECPay, and Coins.ph




How do I repay my loan?
Payment can be partial or in full, as long as it is within the loan period
You may check your loan term duration on the PCash app
Pay through our selected payment channels ONLY: RD Pawnshop, M Lhuillier, 7-Eleven, True Money, EC Pay, GCash, Paymaya, and ShopeePay




What loan term packages do you offer?
We offer a variety of packages depending on your user’s VIP Level
Loan Amount: Php 2,000 - Php 50,000
Loan Duration: 61 - 120 days
Maximum APR: 20%
Transaction fee: Php 0 - Php 150
Other fees: Service fee from 10-20%




PRODUCT INFORMATION
-Amount:₱3,000-₱30,000
-Term: 90days -360 days
-Service fee: 3%-5%
-Transfer Fee: ₱0-₱200
-APR: 18%




Example:
Loan Amount: ₱ 20,000
Loan Term:180 days
with Interest rate: 18%
Transfer fee: ₱ 0
Service fee is ₱ 600
Total service fee and interest will be ₱ 2,400 pesos.
Total received amount is ₱19,400

No monthly payment
Total repayment for 180 days is ₱ 21,800 (20,000*18%/360*180+20,000) only pay on the due date.



*Reminder: Always check the fees, charges, 'Privacy Policy 'and the ‘Terms and Conditions’ of the loan offer before accepting any loan.




Why choose PCash?
PCash offers all the basic features available in any other app:
Simple and Easy Registration Process
Accessible and Available App - Anytime and Anywhere
Multiple Layers of Account Security
Dedicated Customer Service
Exciting Events and Promos




What sets PCash apart from any other loaning app is that PCash respects your right to privacy.
Using our app allows you to increase your VIP level with just a few successful loan applications, which gives you:
High Loan Amount
Longer Loan Duration
Lower Processing Fees



Download the PCash app now!



PCash is an financial platform to aide fellow Filipinos pave their way to a brighter future. Our mobile application ensures affordable, flexible and secure access to financial assistance.



Contact Us
For questions, feedbacks, or concerns, please reach us at:
Website: www.pcash.ph
Facebook: facebook.com/pcashph
Email: info@pcash.ph




Please visit our Facebook Page and official website for the latest updates of PCash FAQs.



PCash PH is operated by Horizon Plus Lending Corporation, with Company Reg. No. 2021110033909-03 and Certificate of Authority No. L-21-0094-28, located in Pasig City.

Kindly read the Terms and Conditions before continuing with your loan application.
